relevant_findings.xanthelasmas: 2 xanthelasma plaques in the periorbital area and 2 xanthelasma papules, 1 over the nose and the other by the right eyebrow

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Reporting changes in xanthelasmas after treatment: within 12 months, some regression was noted; after 4 years, they had almost completely regressed.
